pages.text: Boxers were originally bred as bull baiting dogs, though they later saw usage as companions to butchers.$(br2)Standing barely under a block tall, these sturdy dogs come in four different coats.
Boxers are found most commonly in warm plains and sparse jungles. You can also find them in open windswept hills biomes and, more rarely, meadows.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Beef Treat.
